title: Leaver que bullshit
body: Im fucking tired of getting fucked over by ur stupid system why in the world do i have to lose my fucking lp and went more minutes in que because ur stupid fucking game doesnt want to let me connect please for the love god take these dumbass leaver ques off my account i dc for 2 fucking seconds and it wouldnt let me join back into the game i lose my fucking lp for and i have to wait to get in another game makes no sense hello?

replies.body:
Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a prime reason as to why all disconnections are treated equally and why we cannot modify or remove penalties on your account for any reason.

If you can give me more details around how you're disconnecting or crashing from matches, we can work together to resolve this so penalties are less likely to be added to your account.

so riot based a whole system off of people getting mad when someone leaves. oh please people forget about the game like 2 games after they click report, cry in the baby box after the game then they go on to live their life as normal. anyone taking a game so seriously that they hold a grudge due to someone having an inconvenience in their life should probably not play games. If someone leaves and gets a leaver que i don't see why riot shouldn't be able to remove it given valid reason. Justice is blind unless you are from riot then justice is one sided.

Seriously tho implement an appeal system for this type of stuff {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
